text:
@PMOIndia @narendramodi @narendramodi ji
@AmitShah ji
-Extend lock down for next 21 days
-Later, analyze status of #Coronavirus 
-As drawn Red/Yellow/Green Zones - look into continue / lifting lock down
-Lift lock down for selected controllable essential Industries/ Sectors
-Be prepared for 6Month Plan
